sect1.title: Weighting Relation Attributes
sect1.para: The Weighting Relation Attributes annotator only works on networks where all relations have attributes.
In this network, if we right-click on any relation and select "Show / Edit Properties" followed by "View/Edit Relation attributes", the following window pops up:
Let's open the Weighting Relation Attributes annotator. We can choose the weights to apply to the relation attributes. The annotator window can be adjusted to size.

If we choose 0.8 for the BLAST e-value (BLEV), 0.1 for the co-expression pattern from ATTEDII (Correlation), as well as for the text mining score (TM_SCORE) and click on "Annotate Graph", a new attribute will be added to all relations. Right-click on a relation again and check its attributes. The screenshot below shows the new attribute "weighted".
